step.name: start
step.text:
Welcome to Scorched3D.
This is a short tutorial to help you get to grips with the game.
Continue...

step.name: rulesDialog
step.text:
Below is the rules window. When playing online this window displays any messages from the server. It can also be used to check what game rules are being used.
Remove this window by clicking the Ok button.

step.name: playerDialog1
step.text: Below is the player setup window. This window allows you to choose the name, team and tank that your player will use in the game. Continue...

step.name: playerDialog2
step.text: The name box allows you to enter the name which identifies your tank. Other players will see this name in game. Remove the current name by pressing the delete key, and then type in your name using the keyboard. Continue...

step.name: playerDialog3
step.text: If you have created a game with more than one player you can make some of the players computer controlled by selecting a computer type from the type list. For the moment so you can play, please leave this set to Human. Continue...

step.name: playerDialog4
step.text: The color selection allows you choose the color of your tank. When playing team games it also allows you to choose your team. Continue...
